articles.title: Louis van Gaal says treatment for prostate cancer has been successful - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 70-year-old former Manchester United and Barcelona manager revealed his diagnosis on a Dutch television show earlier this month. Van Gaal is set to lead the side at the World Cup in Qatar.
